review:
I am grateful to Dr. Litta for taking the time to explain in detail about my dental issues and the treatment options.  The procedures did not cause any discomfort, thanks to your impeccable skills as well as your  gentle touch and comforting words. It is such a pleasure to visit your clinic :) 
Thanks again  -- Ruby

I recently consulted Dr. Litta for the pain in wisdom tooth and was extremely impressed with her level of skill and expertise. She walked me through all the options available and executed the treatment with precision and care. Doctor was incredibly professional and approachable, and the clinic was well maintained , clean and spacious, seem to be equipped with all the necessary technology . I'm extremely satisfied with the care and attention I received throughout the process.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are always  here for your service!
